author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Configuration of Geant4 tracking in magnetic field includes now 3 areas:
1) relativistic tracks (E > 200 MeV) inside central CMS
2) low-energy tracks (E < 20 MeV)
3) remaining tracks
Such configuration ensure unbiased simulation trajectories for relativistic tracks (bias below 0.1 micron for tracker hits) and do not bring extra CPU penalty and extra Geant4 tracking problems. Detailed discussion on the problem is in #31665.

This PR change simulation histories, so many differences are expected in MC WFs.

#### PR validation:
private

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR: no
title: Geant4 tracking in magnetic field parameters
